text:
Please fix the link!  I found documentation on fop syntax here: 
http://zvon.org/xxl/xslfoReference/Output/index.html

Is this a valid reference for the apache fop engine?

Thank you.

alex
creator: alex@tappin.com
fotis.jannidis@lrz.uni-muenchen.de
text: zvon.org is not the official xsl:fo reference and it is not the reference for the fos supported by Fop. It is a handy tool to do a quick lookup and has been added to the resources.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
The link in xml-docs/fop/ressources.xml points to the current recommendation
at http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xsl-20011015/. There is also the TR at
http://www.w3.org/TR/xsl/.
